summary: AN ORDINANCE creating the Seattle Commission for People with Disabilities, establishing its responsibilities, providing its administrative support through the Office for Civil Rights, creating a new Seattle Municipal Code Section 3.14.933 and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 3.14.900, 3.14.910, 3.14.920, 3.14.930, 3.14.931, 3.14.932 and 3.14.940.
committee: Culture, Civil Rights, Health and Personnel
